img_text: USTRALIA NZ GOVERNMENT TO BROADCAST THEREİSINOIGODJEUT ALLAH AT HISJERIDAY THIS SAME GOVERNMENT REMOVED THE NAME OF JESUS CHRIST FROM THE PARLIAMENTARY PRAYER TO ENSURE "THAT THE PRAYER WOULD NO LONGER BE SPECIFICALLY CHRISTIAN IN NATURE PARLIAMENT OPENED WITH AN ISLAMIC PRAYER IN ARABIC WHEN IT SAT THIS WEEK FOR THE FIRST TIME SINCE THE MASSACRE.
